data_table.description: The subject consent data table includes subject IDs, consent information, subject source, and affection status for multiple myeloma (MM).

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC
variable.value: Disease-Specific (Myeloma and other cancer-related disorders, MDS) (DS-MCRD-MDS)

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Case control status of the subject for Multiple Myeloma (MM)
